channel.title: New Neutral Converts!
channel.description:
[details="Trickster"] > [color=purple]The Trickster, Unseen, Social[/color] :speech_balloon: > = > Converted from the fool > > Passive 1: Prankster Fellow: if you get lynched then king will lose their force vote if they are good/neut because you stole it > > Passive 2: Tricky Trickery: you are occupation/target change immune but you will not appear to be that to the occupier/target changer. > > Day Ability 1: Trollbox: same > > Night Ability 1: Frame: frame a player > > Night Ability 2: Disguise: disguise as a player making you’re results exactly the same to his, unlimited uses [/details]
[details="Nemesis"] > [color=purple]The Nemesis (name suggested by firekitten), Unseen, Social[/color] :speech_balloon: > = > converts from scorned > > Passive 1: Vengeful: You will gain 2 uses of frame and 1 extra use of me only if one your of targets is lynched > > Passive 2: Enraged: immune to occupation/target change but will not appear to be that to the occupier/target changer. > > Day Ability 1: Trollbox: same as scorned's troll box > > Day Ability 2: Me Only: use this ability to become immune to death for the night, 1 use > > Frame: frame a player 2 use. [/details]
[details="Apothecary"] > [color=purple]Apothecary (name suggested by cbman), Unseen, Support[/color] :shield: > = > converts from the alchemist > > Passive 1: Coagulate: same as alchemist's one > > Day Ability 1: Amethyst Potion: poison a player with nightshade it will take 1 day longer to kill you're target, 2 use > > Night Ability 1: Ruby Potion: heal all the unseen at night unlimited uses > > Night Ability 2: Volatile Tincture: make all whispers to and from this player public for the day, can not be used on King. 2 uses. (cbman's suggestion, I did not make it) [/details]
feedback/suggestions would be appreciated
Edit: forgot to put this in but neut classes that already won can't be converted or elected to be king

item.title: New Neutral Converts!
item.dc:creator: Coatsman
item.description:
I like the ideas and thought you’ve put into them, but I believe Neutral Roles are there for a reason; they allow the tide of a game to be turned at any time. Allowing them to be converted to favour one side just seems completely unfair.

item.description:
anon98616575:

The only one that shouldnt convert is Scorned, as the Scorned already knows a BD target. It would be unfair ultimately.

I respectfully disagree with you because these 2 BD can be useless classes like CW for example and the Scorned’s targets are guaranteed to not be prince.

Also you could technically say the same thing about Observer, he can peek to 2 people to discover if their BD and then gets converted into Nightwatch/Seeker and tells the unseen/cult their findings

Edit: plus you wouldn’t want to kill them at night since you will get 2 uses of frame and 1 extra use of me only, if you lynch them
